name: Nuit et ̶J̶o̶u̶r̶
description:
Github roject link: https://github.com/Sekori1/GameJam

nuit-et-jour.gauzi.fr

In the year 2656, mankind went underground to avoid the sun's rays, which had become harmful to humans. But a group of humans set themselves the goal of being able to reclaim the surface. They will have to face different trials such as sudden climate changes or natural disasters. In order to be able to live on the surface one day, they will have to improve their knowledge of how to improve the climate so that they can live outside the underground.
